item.title: Mastering Natural Language Processing #1 - Words as vectors
item.author: younesbelkada@gmail.com (Younes Belkada)
item.description: This is my first post in 2022! For this year I have decided to learn as much as I can about Natural Language Processing (NLP) and be able to master the notions and techniques around NLP. Why NLP is so exciting? Natural Language Processing is an application of AI and Deep Learning that allows machines and algorithms understand languages (Natural Language) in order to easily deal with any problems related to text (text classification, sentiment analysis, summarization, etc.
